Recommendations.Title: Recycling and waste | Hertfordshire County Council
Key Strengths: Provides information on disposal of waste and recycling campaigns
Contains link to report fly tipping
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides relevant information about council customer's needs related to recycling and waste disposal. It includes options for reporting fly tipping which is a common concern for residents.

Recommendations.Title: Contact us | Hertfordshire County Council
Key Strengths: Offers multiple ways to contact the council including phone, email and online forms
Includes a list of specific services that can be contacted through this page
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides an easy way for council customers to reach out to the relevant services directly. The structured listing of service categories increases its relevance.

Recommendations.Title: Stevenage recycling centre | Hertfordshire County Council
Key Strengths: Details the location and contact information for a recycling center in Stevenage
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link pertains to a specific recycling center, which may be of interest to council customers who live in or near Stevenage. The inclusion of details about bin availability is also useful for planning visits.

Recommendations.Title: Reuse | Hertfordshire County Council
Key Strengths: Provides information about reusing household items instead of disposing them as waste
Links to multiple options for reusing various types of items
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link offers council customers an opportunity to reduce waste by reusing items, which is in line with the council's sustainability initiatives. The variety of options makes it a suitable recommendation.

Recommendations.Title: Contact us | Hertfordshire County Council
Key Strengths: Allows residents to report suspicions of fraudulent activity by traders
Offers support in identifying potential fraud activities
Recommendations.Reasoning: While this link doesn't directly address the waste and recycling needs, it provides an important service by enabling residents to report suspicious behavior from traders, which can negatively impact the community.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The provided list contains a mix of relevant and indirectly related links for council customer information needs. I prioritized the explicitly waste-related options given the instructions.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Based on the confidence scores, recommendations 1, 4, 5, 9 are suitable for council customers seeking information about their needs. Recommendation 4 appears twice but offers slightly different functionalities.
